channel.title: Times of India
channel.description: The Times of India: Breaking news, views, reviews, cricket from across India
channel.copyright: Copyright:(C) 2014 Bennett Coleman & Co. Ltd, http://info.indiatimes.com/terms/tou.html

item.title: BJP prepares for life after Shiv Sena, but keeps door open
item.description: Reconciled to the near inevitable break-up with the Shiv Sena, BJP rolled out a plan to contest all 288 seats in Maharashtra with its smaller allies.

item.title: Chinese soldiers pitch seven tents in Chumar, stand-off continues
item.description: The stand-off in Chumar area of Ladakh took a new turn with China's People's Liberation Army pitching seven tents well within the Indian territory.

item.title: Narendra Modi to start US visit with CEO-packed breakfast
item.description: Taking forward his plans for India’s economic recovery, Prime Minister Narendra Modi will embark on a massive charm offensive with America’s corporate elite.

item.title: Mars orbiter faces crucial test today
item.description: India’s Mars Orbiter Mission will face the first test of its last manoeuvre around 2.30pm on Monday when the main liquid engine of the spacecraft is expected to fire for four seconds.

item.title: Soaring potato prices give Centre headache
item.description: Increase in potato prices across the country except in some part of Karntaka, Kerala and Tamil Nadu seems giving tough time to government after it was successful to kept a check on onion prices and even tomato prices reducing significantly in the past one month.
